qas.question: Along with jellabiyad, what is the jellabiya called in Somali?
In what region do men commonly wear the jellabiya?

context: Due to Somalia's proximity to and close ties with the Arabian Peninsula, many Somali men also wear the jellabiya (jellabiyad or <a1_0>qamiis<a1_0/> in Somali), <a0_0>a long white garment<a0_0/> common in <a2_0>the Arab world<a2_0/>.
